document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Had </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">This, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">or </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">This, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">said, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#60c8ff">Appealing </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Myself, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">In </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#60c8ff">moment </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d440ff">prosperity </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#60c8ff">Inadequate </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">were </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">Life </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">"Thou </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#60c8ff">hast </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Me, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">nor </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Me" </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">said, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">In </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#60c8ff">moment </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d440ff">Reverse </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">"And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">yet </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Thou </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">art </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffc04e">industrious </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">No </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">need </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">had'st </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Thou </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">us </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">-"? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">My </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">need </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">was </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">all </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">had </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">said </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">need </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">did </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#60c8ff">reduce </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Because </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">food </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#60c8ff">exterminate </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">hunger </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">does </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#60c8ff">cease </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">But </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#60c8ff">diligence </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#84c4e0">sharper </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#60c8ff">Proportioned </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">chance </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffa444">feed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">opon </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">Retrogade </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">Enfeebles </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffc04e">Advance </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Had I not this or this I said
